directions: [["Combine all Marinade Base ingredients in a bowl and whisk until sugar is dissolved."],["Slowly add oil, whisking constantly. "],["Place flank steak inside marinade and seal. Refrigerate, turning occasionally, for 1 to 12 hours."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
